issues.title: Infrastructure upgrade
issues.description_md:
Due to a higher load and frequent DDoS attacks we need to upgrade our infrastructure and optimize our code to stabilize our service and scale our systems.

Unfortunately, this can lead to some short outages when trying to access our website, dashboard or public status pages. Everything will be working perfectly when we are done with the work, we promise.
issues.description:
Due to a higher load and frequent DDoS attacks we need to upgrade our infrastructure and optimize our code to stabilize our service and scale our systems.

Unfortunately, this can lead to some short outages when trying to access our website, dashboard or public status pages. Everything will be working perfectly when we are done with the work, we promise.
